ai-tha-ap506:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap506:1.4_0: I keeping the best of cattle.
ai-tha-ap506:2.1_0: I see a fruit of good deeds,
ai-tha-ap506:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap506:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap506:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap506:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap506:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Night.
ai-tha-ap506:8.1_0: fourth part of the senior monks;
